name: Drive & Park Police Car
description:
Drive & Park Police Car has always been challenging just like any other car parking game. But the challenge is more harder and difficult then a normal car or prado parking game.
Drive & Park Police Car helps you to building your parking skills which you can use to park your vehicle if you face such scenario. You won’t have to think at that time about yourself or ask yourself, can i do it. You always say, yes, I am ready to do it and I can do it. This game not only make you learn but it is also a very interesting and exciting game.

Drive & Park Police Car: Features:
Realistic car and prado vehicles models
Unique idea having collection of parking
Different camera angles
A wide variety of police car parking spots
A game having remarkable creativity adventure
